summary: Completed iteration 4 testing. Backend APIs 95.2% success rate (20/21 tests). Admin panel functional with login working. Mobile responsiveness verified - no horizontal scroll at 375px/768px. Student pages require proper authentication. Minor UI issues found.

minor.issue: Returns status 200 instead of 201 for successful ticket creation
minor.impact: Minor - ticket is created successfully, just wrong HTTP status code

ui_bugs.issue:
React hydration warnings:

inside

, inside from framer-motion
Chart width(-1) and height(-1) rendering errors
No visible hamburger menu toggle found at mobile sizes
No file upload elements found for image upload functionality

integration_issues.issue: Student pages (notifications, certificates, referrals, tickets) not accessible without proper admin/student login

issues: Privacy Policy page has minimal content
Terms of Service page has minimal content

passed_tests: Admin users page loads with 14 users
Admin tickets page loads with 10 tickets
CMS dynamic pages APIs (About, Contact, FAQ, Pricing)
Mobile responsiveness - no horizontal scroll at 375px width
Tablet responsiveness - no horizontal scroll at 768px width
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix React hydration warnings by replacing framer-motion in table components with CSS animations
Ensure mobile navigation has visible hamburger menu toggle
Add file upload UI elements to profile page for image upload functionality
Add more content to Privacy Policy and Terms of Service CMS pages
Fix chart container sizing to prevent width/height -1 errors

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (admin panel working, mobile responsive, minor UI issues)
